info.title: AIS Reporter API
info.description:
[pdjr-ais-reporter](https://github.com/pdjr-signalk/pdjr-ais-reporter)
is a plugin for the
[Signal K node server](https://github.com/SignalK/signalk-server).

A Signal K server hosting the plugin will present this API under
the root https://*server_ip*:*server_port*/plugins/ais-reporter.

get.description: Get a digest reporting the status of all configured endpoints.

200.description:
Success.
The response body is an object containing a status report
object for each endpoint keyed by endpoint name.

ipAddress.description: IP address of the report endpoint.

port.description: Port number of the report endpoint.

started.description: Time (UTC) at which the plugin commenced operation.

totalBytesTransmitted.description: Number of bytes transmitted to the endpoint since the plugin started.

positionSelfBytesPerHour.description: Number of bytes transmitted to the endpoint per hour as part of a position report for vessel 'self'.

positionOthersBytesPerHour.description: Number of bytes transmitted to the endpoint per hour as part of position reports for all vessels other than 'self'.

staticSelfBytesPerHour.description: Number of bytes transmitted to the endpoint per hour as part of a static data report for vessel 'self'.

staticOthersBytesPerHour.description: Number of bytes transmitted to the endpoint per hour as part of static data reports for all vessels other than 'self'.

500.description:
Error.
The server was unable to service the request.
